about: Our app is designed to help you find nearby bus stops, MRT stops, and taxi availability. Bus stops are shown within a 1km radius, taxis within a 2km radius, and MRT stations within a 3km radius. You can also view fare information for your journey.
bus_stop_info: Bus stops are displayed within a 1km radius of your current location.
taxi_info: Taxi availability is shown within a 2km radius of your current location.
mrt_info: MRT stops are provided within a 3km radius of your current location.
fares_info: You can view fare information for the different modes of transport in our app.
